name: Gratter des annuaires d'entreprises locales avec Bright Data et OpenAI pour la g√©n√©ration de leads
description:
*Ce flux de travail contient des n≈ìuds communautaires qui ne sont compatibles qu'avec la version auto-h√©berg√©e de n8n.*

Ce flux de travail gratte automatiquement des annuaires d'entreprises locales (Yelp, Pages Jaunes, Google Maps, etc.) pour construire une base de donn√©es structur√©e de prospects. Arr√™tez de copier les annonces √† la main‚Äîobtenez des leads frais livr√©s directement dans Google Sheets.

## Aper√ßu

En utilisant Bright Data, l'automatisation r√©cup√®re les noms d'entreprises, les coordonn√©es, les √©valuations et les cat√©gories pour une ville ou un code postal donn√©. OpenAI nettoie et normalise les donn√©es, tandis que la d√©tection des doublons garantit que chaque entreprise n'appara√Æt qu'une seule fois. Le r√©sultat est envoy√© par e-mail sous forme de CSV et stock√© dans Sheets pour un filtrage facile.

## Outils Utilis√©s

- **n8n** ‚Äì Orchestration de flux de travail
- **Bright Data** ‚Äì G√®re le grattage d'annuaires √† grande √©chelle
- **OpenAI** ‚Äì Effectue le nettoyage des entit√©s et la d√©-duplication
- **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Contient la liste des leads r√©sultante
- **Gmail** ‚Äì Envoie le fichier CSV dans votre bo√Æte de r√©ception

## Comment Installer

1. **Importer le Flux de Travail** : Chargez le `.json` dans n8n.
2. **Configurer Bright Data** : Ajoutez vos identifiants.
3. **Configurer OpenAI** : Entrez votre cl√© API.
4. **Connecter Google Sheets & Gmail** : Autorisez les deux int√©grations.
5. **Personnaliser les Lieux & Cat√©gories** : Ajustez les param√®tres dans le n≈ìud de d√©marrage.

## Cas d'Utilisation

- **G√©n√©ration de Leads Locaux** : Construire des listes de prospection pour des agences ou des SaaS.
- **Recherche de March√©** : Analyser la densit√© des entreprises dans une r√©gion.
- **Expansion de Franchise** : Identifier des partenaires potentiels dans un territoire.
- **Ventes de Startups** : D√©couvrir des PME qui correspondent √† votre ICP.

## Connectez-vous avec Moi

- **Site Web** : https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube** : https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn** : https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Obtenez Bright Data** : https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Utiliser ce lien soutient mes flux de travail gratuits avec une petite commission)

nodes.name: üîó Set Yelp Business URL for Dr

parameters.text:
=You are a data extraction agent.

Scrape the following Yelp URL:
{{ $json.URL }}

Extract data for businesses (Doctors) listed on this page. For each business, provide the following details: 

- `Business Name`: The name of the business (Doctor's name or practice).
- `Location`: The full address or location of the business.
- `Contact Phone`: The contact Phone of the business (if available, otherwise dont return ).
- `Category`: The category or type of business (e.g., "Doctors").
- `Rating`: The Yelp rating (numeric value, e.g., "4.5").
- `Reviews`: The number of reviews.
- `Website`: The website of the business (if available, otherwise dont return ).

nodes.name: üìß Send Partnership Proposal to Business Email

parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $json.output[0].business_name }},

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to explore a potential partnership with your business, as I noticed your exceptional reputation on Yelp with a rating of {{ $json.output[0].rating }}. We specialize in providing innovative solutions for businesses in the {{ $json.output[0].category }} industry, and I believe there is a strong synergy between our services.

Please let us know if you're open to discussing further details. You can visit our website at {{ $json.output[0].website }}, or feel free to reach out via email at shahkar.genai@gmail.com.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Company]
parameters.subject: =Potential Partnership with {{ $json.output[0].business_name }}

parameters.content:
### üîπ **SECTION 1: Trigger & Set Yelp Business URL**

#### üß© **Nodes:**

* `‚ö° Trigger: Manual Execution`
* `üìù Set Yelp Business URL for Dr. William Kimbrough, MD`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. **Trigger the Workflow:**

   * You **manually start** the workflow by clicking the **"Execute"** button in n8n.
2. **Set Yelp Business URL:**

   * **You input** the URL of the **Yelp business profile** for Dr. William Kimbrough (or any business you want) into the system, and this URL will serve as the data source for the rest of the workflow.

   Example URL:
   `https://www.yelp.com/biz/dr-william-kimbrough-md`

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Simple Setup:** This section lets you easily input the URL of **any Yelp business**, so you can use this workflow for multiple businesses by just changing the URL each time.
* **No coding skills required:** Simply paste the URL, click **‚ÄúExecute‚Äù**, and you're good to go!

### ü§ñ **SECTION 2: AI Agent Scrapes Business Information**

#### üß© **Node:**

* `ü§ñ Agent: Scrape Yelp Business Info`

##### **Sub-Nodes Inside the Agent:**

* **üß† AI Model: Process Data**: Understands the data request and prepares for scraping.
* **üåê Bright Data MCP Client: Scrape as Markdown**: Scrapes business data from the Yelp profile using the **Bright Data MCP Client** with the **‚Äúscrape\_as\_markdown‚Äù** tool.
* **üßæ Parse Scraped Data into JSON**: Takes the raw data from Yelp and organizes it into **JSON format**, so it‚Äôs easy to use in later steps.

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. The **AI Model** receives the request to scrape the Yelp business profile data.
2. The **MCP Client** is the tool that accesses the **Yelp website** and **scrapes** the business information, such as reviews, address, hours, phone number, and services offered.
3. The scraped data is **parsed and structured** into a **JSON format**, which ensures the data is ready to be used in other steps of the workflow (e.g., sending it via email).

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Effortless Scraping:** The **AI Agent** automatically scrapes all the necessary business details from Yelp without you needing to manually copy or extract any information.
* **No Coding:** Simply set the Yelp URL, and the AI handles the scraping and organizing.

### üìß **SECTION 3: Send Email Proposal to Business**

#### üß© **Node:**

* `üìß Send Partnership Proposal to Business Email`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. After the business details are scraped and organized, the workflow **automatically sends** an email to the **business‚Äôs email address** (found in the Yelp profile) with a **partnership proposal**.
2. The email can include a personalized message, along with the **scraped business information**, offering a **business partnership**.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Automated Emailing:** You don‚Äôt have to write or send emails manually. The workflow sends a **pre-drafted proposal** to the business, making it faster and more efficient.
* **Outreach Efficiency:** This allows you to automatically send partnership emails to multiple businesses by simply changing the Yelp URL each time.

## üöÄ **Yelp Business Scraper and Email Workflow for Partnership Proposal**

This workflow is designed to help you automatically scrape **business details** from a **Yelp business profile** (like Dr. William Kimbrough‚Äôs profile), then send a **partnership proposal email** to the business. Let‚Äôs break it down into **3 simple sections**!

---

### üîπ **SECTION 1: Trigger & Set Yelp Business URL**

#### üß© **Nodes:**

* `‚ö° Trigger: Manual Execution`
* `üìù Set Yelp Business URL for Dr. William Kimbrough, MD`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. **Trigger the Workflow:**

   * You **manually start** the workflow by clicking the **"Execute"** button in n8n.
2. **Set Yelp Business URL:**

   * **You input** the URL of the **Yelp business profile** for Dr. William Kimbrough (or any business you want) into the system, and this URL will serve as the data source for the rest of the workflow.

   Example URL:
   `https://www.yelp.com/biz/dr-william-kimbrough-md`

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Simple Setup:** This section lets you easily input the URL of **any Yelp business**, so you can use this workflow for multiple businesses by just changing the URL each time.
* **No coding skills required:** Simply paste the URL, click **‚ÄúExecute‚Äù**, and you're good to go!

---

### ü§ñ **SECTION 2: AI Agent Scrapes Business Information**

#### üß© **Node:**

* `ü§ñ Agent: Scrape Yelp Business Info`

##### **Sub-Nodes Inside the Agent:**

* **üß† AI Model: Process Data**: Understands the data request and prepares for scraping.
* **üåê Bright Data MCP Client: Scrape as Markdown**: Scrapes business data from the Yelp profile using the **Bright Data MCP Client** with the **‚Äúscrape\_as\_markdown‚Äù** tool.
* **üßæ Parse Scraped Data into JSON**: Takes the raw data from Yelp and organizes it into **JSON format**, so it‚Äôs easy to use in later steps.

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. The **AI Model** receives the request to scrape the Yelp business profile data.
2. The **MCP Client** is the tool that accesses the **Yelp website** and **scrapes** the business information, such as reviews, address, hours, phone number, and services offered.
3. The scraped data is **parsed and structured** into a **JSON format**, which ensures the data is ready to be used in other steps of the workflow (e.g., sending it via email).

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Effortless Scraping:** The **AI Agent** automatically scrapes all the necessary business details from Yelp without you needing to manually copy or extract any information.
* **No Coding:** Simply set the Yelp URL, and the AI handles the scraping and organizing.

---

### üìß **SECTION 3: Send Email Proposal to Business**

#### üß© **Node:**

* `üìß Send Partnership Proposal to Business Email`

#### üí° **What Happens:**

1. After the business details are scraped and organized, the workflow **automatically sends** an email to the **business‚Äôs email address** (found in the Yelp profile) with a **partnership proposal**.
2. The email can include a personalized message, along with the **scraped business information**, offering a **business partnership**.

#### ‚úÖ **How You Can Use It:**

* **Automated Emailing:** You don‚Äôt have to write or send emails manually. The workflow sends a **pre-drafted proposal** to the business, making it faster and more efficient.
* **Outreach Efficiency:** This allows you to automatically send partnership emails to multiple businesses by simply changing the Yelp URL each time.

---

### **Summary of the Workflow**

| **Section**                                 | **What Happens**                                                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **üîò Section 1: Trigger & Input URL**       | You manually trigger the workflow and input the Yelp URL of the business you want to scrape (e.g., Dr. William Kimbrough‚Äôs Yelp profile). |
| **ü§ñ Section 2: Scrape Yelp Business Info** | The AI Agent scrapes the business info from Yelp and formats it into a **structured JSON format**.                                        |
| **üìß Section 3: Send Email**                | Automatically sends a **partnership proposal email** to the business using the **scraped data**.                                          |

---

### ‚úÖ **How This Helps You:**

| **Use Case**                           | **Benefit**                                                      |
| -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ü§ù **Partnership Outreach**            | Automatically send partnership proposals to businesses.          |
| üìà **Business Information Collection** | Scrape business info (e.g., hours, reviews) from Yelp with ease. |
| üïí **Time-Saving**                     | No more manual scraping and emailing. **Save hours of work**.    |

## I‚Äôll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link‚Äîthanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
